product_name: Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth Vacuum Water Bottle - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: Whether you're climbing a mountain or heading to a friend's house, the 32 fl. oz. Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth vacuum bottle keeps your favorite cold beverage or hot soup at just the right temperature. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps the contents hot for 12 hrs. or cold for 24 hrs. The inside temperature won't affect the outside temperature of the container-that means no burned fingers from hot beverages or condensation from ice-cold drinks. Wide-mouth opening is 2.19 in. in diameter, making it easy to fill the bottle with beverages, ice cubes, soups and more. Tough, food-grade 18/8 stainless steel is BPA free and resistant to bacteria and odors. Note: Bottle may not be 100% leakproof when filled with carbonated beverages; keep the bottle upright.
short_description: Whether you're climbing a mountain or heading to a friend's house, the 32 fl. oz. Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth vacuum bottle keeps your favorite cold beverage or hot soup at just the right temperature.
